title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid

**Age Range:** 6 and up

**Product Description:**

Get ready for epic battles with the Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid! This ultimate playset is designed for kids aged 6 and up and comes with everything you need to start your Bakugan adventure.

**Customizable Arena:**

* Build and customize your own arena with the included deluxe arena and sparring totem
* Compatible with training sets (sold separately) to upgrade your battle experience
* Built-in phone holder to capture your battles and share with friends

**Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid:**

* Includes an exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid action figure with spinning feature
* Ripcord included for intense battles
* Collect and customize your Dragonoid with the multi-part ball linking system

**Playset Contents:**

* 1 Deluxe Arena
* 1 Special Attack Bakugan
* 2 Clan Flags
* 3 Sparring Totem
* 1 Character Card
* 1 Special Attack Card
* 2 Gate Card
* 1 XL Rip Cord
* 1 Bakugan Token

**Additional Features:**

* Roll and display base for epic battles
* Transformations when rolled on Gate Cards
* Special code for online game on Roblox
* Compatible with Roblox online game

**Collectible Aspects:**

* Special Attack variants to collect and trade
* Battle packs available to expand your collection

**Manufacturer Commitment:**

* Spin Master Care Commitment ensures high-quality products and customer satisfaction

**Ideal For:**

* Boys and girls aged 6 and up
* Action figure enthusiasts
* Collectors of Bakugan toys
* Fans of Roblox online game

**Starter Pack:** This playset is a great starter pack for kids new to Bakugan, with everything they need to start their adventure.

Order your Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid today and get ready to roll into battle!

**Product Listing:**

**Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid**

**Get Ready for Epic Battles!**

Unleash the ultimate Bakugan battle experience with this exclusive battle arena, featuring a Special Attack Dragonoid action figure! This customizable arena is designed for kids aged 6 and up, providing hours of fun and excitement.

* 1 Deluxe Battle Arena with built-in phone holder

* 2 Clan Flags

* 1 Character Card

**Customize and Upgrade:**

* Multi-part ball linking system allows for endless customization options
* Compatible with training sets (sold separately) for even more battle possibilities
* Collect and trade Bakugan figures to create your ultimate team

**Online Gaming:**

* Includes special code for online game play on Roblox
* Experience the world of Bakugan like never before

**Manufacturer Commitment:**

* Spin Master Care Commitment ensures high-quality products and customer satisfaction

**Ideal For:**

* Boys and girls aged 6 and up
* Fans of action figures and collectibles
* Those who love Roblox online gaming

**Product Type:** Toys for Boys and Girls

**Order Now and Get Ready to Roll!**

This starter pack is the perfect introduction to the world of Bakugan, with everything you need to start battling and collecting. Don't miss out on this epic adventure!
